Terminology

2FA: An app for smartphones which give the user a secondary line of defence for their online accounts

Bank: Centralised Deathbox;

Bitcoin: Frictionless UtilityJ; Digital Cash; Digital Money

Blockchain: Shared Accounting Ledger; a Shared Book of Accounts; a Shared Bank Statement for all the Bitcoins in the world

Cold-Wallet: Offline Cold Storage; Offline Wallet; no record of public or private keys stored online

Cryptocurrency: [Decentralised] Digital Money

Hot-Wallet: Online Ready Cash; Online Wallet

Identifier (blockchain.info): Like a Username

Mnemonic Phrase (pronounced ‘nimonik’, Aiding or designed to aid the memory) A sequence of 4-20 random words, used as an unbreakable password

Multi-Signature: Joint Wallet/Account; Joint Business Account/Conditional Access

POS: Point of Sale

Private Key: Password/Phrase

Public Key: Account Number/Wallet Address

Strong Password: A combination of upper and lower case letters, numbers and punctuation 16-30 characters in length

Wallet: Digital Wallet; Online Wallet

Group 1 - This website is for educational purposes
